Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 81st overall pick, by Diablo in 1977...
Injured on 7/15/1978 with a Bruised Foot, out for one week...
Injured on 7/19/1980 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/21/1980, off Vincent Stutts (LYN)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/5/1981, off Joe Cureton (CC)...
Injured on 9/25/1983 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1984, hitting .591 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 3/1/1991 to a minor league contract.
